description: Multiplicative order of 9 mod n, where GCD(n, 9) = 1.
comments: Essentially the same as A050981. [_R. J. Mathar_, Oct 13 2008]
mathematica: MultiplicativeOrder[9, #] & /@ Select[ Range@ 125, GCD[9, #] == 1 &] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Apr 05 2011 *)
prog: (PARI) lista(nn) = {for(n=1, nn, if (gcd(n, 9) == 1, print1(znorder(Mod(9, n)), ", ")););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 09 2015
author: _David W. Wilson_
